questions.question: Why is improving reader performance so important?
options: Reader performance directly determines transformation performance
Reader performance directly determines writing performance
Poor reader performance can cause errors in your data
Features read at the start of a workspace often pass through many transformers

questions.question: Which of the following is not a way to filter data while reading?
options: Deleting parts of your source data you don't need
